commands.name: az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor create
commands.summary: Create a SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard for the specified subscription, resource group, and resource name.
examples: az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor create -g <RG-NAME> --monitor-name <monitor-name> --grouping <grouping- details>

commands.name: az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor delete
commands.summary: Delete a SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard with the specified subscription, resource group, and SAP monitor name.

commands.name: az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor list
commands.summary: List configuration values for Single Pane Of Glass for SAP monitor for the specified subscription, resource group, and resource name.

commands.name: az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor show
commands.summary: Show configuration values for Single Pane Of Glass for SAP monitor for the specified subscription, resource group, and resource name.

commands.name: az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor update
commands.summary: Update a SAP Landscape Monitor Dashboard for the specified subscription, resource group, and resource name.
commands.syntax:
az workloads monitor sap-landscape-monitor update [--add]
                                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                  [--grouping]
                                                  [--ids]
                                                  [--monitor-name]
                                                  [--remove]
                                                  [--resource-group]
                                                  [--set]
                                                  [--subscription]
                                                  [--top-metrics-thresholds]
